title: GREAT STUDIO in FENWAY!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 297715650', 'Rent: $1,850 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER for 12 month lease - This is an amazing spacious studio apartment nearby Back Bay Fens.', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', 'Big windows.', 'Tiled kitchen and bathroom.', 'Heat and hot water included and laundry in the building.', 'Cats allowed.', 'Parking may be available for rent based on current demand.', 'Unfortunately the owner does not take students here.', 'PHD candidates with stipend will be considered on a case by case basis.', '1 month fee!', 'The location is absolutely amazing.', "Centrally located nearby Longwood Medical Area, giving access to multiple hospitals such as Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Boston's Children's Hospital, Brigham and Women's Hospital.and Dana–Farber Cancer Institute.", 'Several train stations (Hynes Conventions is closest), multiple bus lines, and tons of entertainment all within short distance.', 'The Back Bay and Newbury Street & Boylston Street in one direction, and historic Fenway Park in the other.', 'The Emerald Necklace surrounds the area, offering walking and biking paths.', 'There are countless, stores, restaurants, pubs, and more all nearby.', 'To view this apartment or for any questions, please send inquires about this apartment to David.']
